text:
<@U6D2VCN07> Hi Matthieu, hope you're doing well! 

We are kicking off a new programme and hoping to re-use your Smooz shared channels. 

The programme is starting at 30 shared channels but will increase gradually over the course of the the next year. Do you have a price for just 30 shared channels for now? Previously it was 75â‚¬/month, for 150 shared channels.
